name: LoL-Iris
body:
![Iris Logo](http://i.imgur.com/rvFDvpC.png)
# the LoL Communicator
## The radial-menu-driven, in-game-overlayed, contextual, Riot-API-enabled, completely customizable chat macro system, named for the Greek goddess of rainbows and IPV6 traffic
### Because no one actually wants to listen to each other's toxic asses, older brothers, and mouth-breathing in Curse Voice
Check your privilege, shitlord, and I don't mean in the RIP-o, because this project was 169% trans-coded by the queerest woman to ever receive an honorable discharge
##BROUGHT TO YOU BY
![RitoSaltworks Logo](http://i.imgur.com/kS1OvuQ.png)

# A~~N~~ ~~AD~~(FREE)VENTURE BY

![K pot Logo](http://i.imgur.com/qbqgwae.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
